thread.title: It's Gopi Sunder who composed Mukkathe Penne
thread.title_full: It's Gopi Sunder who composed Mukkathe Penne - The Times of India

author: Asha Prakash
title: It's Gopi Sunder who composed Mukkathe Penne
text:
There is widespread confusion on who composed the songs of ENnu Ninte Moideen. While it was M Jayachandran and Ramesh Narayan who composed four of the songs, it was Gopi Sunder who composed the theme song - Mukkathe Penne.
The composer has done the BGM as well. Ever since Mukkathe Penne became a hit, some listeners started congratulating the former duo, and at one point, Gopi Sunder himself clarified in a comment in his facebook page that it was he who composed the song. Gopi Sunder was supposed to compose the music for the entire film, but was not able to, owing to prior commitments.
